items/other/blacksmithing/hoe_copper/des: A copper hoe. Can be charged to till 3 tiles in a row.
items/other/blacksmithing/hoe_gold/descr: A splendid golden hoe. Can be charged to till a 6x6 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/hoe_iron/descr: An iron hoe. Can be charged to till a 3x3 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/hoe_mistril/de: A hoe made from mistril. Can be charged to till a 6x9 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/hoe_silver/des: A silver hoe. Can be charged to till a 3x6 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/hoe_worn/descr: A worn but still serviceable hoe. Used to till dirt in preparation for planting seeds.
